m_szDocTitle: London railway stations gain charge points | Fleet World
m_szDocSumamry: News London railway stations gain charge points Network Rail has installed eight electric vehicle charging points at London's Victoria and Euston station car parks, as a result of a partnership with infrastructure specialist ChargePoint Services. All units are GE DuraStation dual-socket charging points, networked via a GPRS data connection and RFID complaint with the Source London Plugged-in Places membership scheme, which already includes over 1,300 public access charging points.Â  There are three at Victoria Station, and five at Euston, backing up a benefits package for rail travellers which
